script: Well, hey there, Forel! Top of the {time_of_day} to ya!
My job? I mean, normally a *faithful* is meant to... well, sleep with the Sydan. But I don't really do that?
So Eraton lets me be the less-sexy-time *event* *planner*! It goes... well, it definitely goes.
Yeah, we didn't have any *parents* around to give us normal group *activities*. So I've taken up the position of fun mom!
last_dialog=job++And if dealing with these guys is what being a mom is like, I'm glad Eraton said I don't have to have kids.
Pakuk Qanitaq, at your service!
Hm? Where did 'Ginny' come from, then? I'm not just gonna tell you that, silly!
Huh? Yeah, didn't you know? Most of us were sent here by our parents when we were really little. We're gifts to the Sydan to strengthen relations between the throne and our families!
I think the oldest to get here was Bahati when she was thirteen? She's also the recentest. I came here when I was four, after-- wait!
I just remembered, it's a Qanitaq family *secret*! Qani-top secret. I'm not supposed to tell you.
I've had a bunch of ideas, but none of them seem to really catch on.
We tried baking, which went well at first. But then some of the others got it in their heads to use... ingredients they made.
I can never hear 'cream-filling' or 'bun in the oven' normally ever again.
Bahati was supportive of my costumes idea, but everyone else just wanted to make theirs as revealing as possible. Same with acting. I'd learned by then not to say 'performing'.
Wrestling... I probably should've seen the direction that went in.
At this point I'm scared to suggest going to the petting zoo, if only because I know one of them is going to try 'stroking pussy' and Eraton does NOT need that kind of controversy right now.
It's just so frustrating. I'm glad everyone likes being... with each other. I just want there to be a way for us all to hang out again.
Sigh. Maybe my *luchadores* idea will work better.
Nope! Ataata said no telling allowed.
Oh! Ataata means my *father*.
I mean, we HAVE parents, duh! Everyone... has... ahem.
It's just that they *sent* us here all here. They probably wanted Eraton to have friends to stand by him after the Blue Moon tragedy.
It's an idea I had for a new kind of wrestling I had!
Instead of just being a bunch of grappling, the wrestlers are super-powered and fight with honor and tradition to defeat evil wrestlers in awesome ways.
I called it 'luchadores' since Maddy was helping me out! Or... she tried to. --n Anyways, the word comes from the Salin 'luchar' which means 'struggle'.
That's right, I pulled out a dictionary for this, baby!
I'm still working on how to justify costumes staying on as a win condition, though.
The mask I decided is because of secret identity, but for the actual costume... 'no one wants to see that' doesn't really work when the others do, in fact, want to see that.
Wait, you actually want me to come along with you? Heck yeah! Exploring Sewinso, punching shades and bad guys!
I know a few Icelandic prayers, too! Ataata taught me to respect Agloolik.
Hm? What do you mean I asked-- oh! No, no, it wasn't me who asked me to join you. You're thinking of PhiteQanitaq.
She wears a cape while I wear a robe, see? Totally different people.
__(...It's easier to just nod.)
So, we gonna go tell Eraton we're heading out?
Silly, I already agreed to come with you, remember?
Sweet!
I'll meet up with you when it's time to leave! Lemme just make sure my room is all tidy and I got enough stuff packed up!
force_end=
Awww, come on! Don't get my hopes up like that.
He's the highlord of the Icelands! He oversees all the tribes there and makes sure they stay united. It was also his idea that I become faithful!
